column1: #Text=" Gun says : " It 's being done as we speak .
#Text=" Korra says : " So now , Your Majesty , if I could start meeting some of the airbenders here in the city .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " The Dai Li thoroughly searched the city , but it seems your reports were incorrect .
#Text=There are no airbenders in Ba Sing Se .
#Text=So , you can gather your little band and be on your way tomorrow .
#Text=" Korra says : " You make me do your dirty work extorting your own citizens for your stupid palaces and topiaries and then you just want to send me away ?
#Text=We 're not going anywhere until we find some airbenders !
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " Get her out of my sight !
#Text=" Korra says : " This is n't over !
